name: YES NO: the dungeon
description:
yes no is my first game jam game, it's even the first game I have ever publish. 

the theme of this game jam was "oh no!" so I decided to make a game with simple choices : yes or no. the goal of the game is simple, you just have to make the best score possible (mine was 25) I the game there is curently 3 enemys and 3 weapons to kill them. each weapon can only kill one type of enemy:

the axe -> the log monster

the hammer -> the nail monster

the forkspoon   -> the soup monster

you might want to hold on to this forkspoon in case the next enemy is a soup or maybe a log monster block the path, you should've  kept that trusty axe!
